website_summaries.verdict: The Teva Hurricane XLT2 Cross Strap sandals give outdoorsy people a new companion on their adventures. The simple yet trendy look, zero break-in period, and lightness were some of the features which appealed to those who are looking for a new pair of footwear. The product’s inexpensiveness, of course, is the chief advantage. However, the pair failed to please when it comes to the cross strap. Overall, the Hurricane XLT2 Cross Strap still delivered well on the trails.
pros: Almost all online buyers mentioned that the Teva Hurricane XLT2 Cross Strap was utterly comfortable
Its stylish yet simple look stunned a considerable number of wearers
Some owners lauded this hiking sandal for being lightweight
The awesome fit of the Hurricane XLT Cross Strap was praised by plenty of users
According to a lot of impressed hikers, they were able to use it on most outdoor activities
Its affordability was a prime selling point for numerous verified purchasers
More than a handful praised the closure system of the Hurricane XLT2 Cross Strap from Teva
The almost nonexistent break-in period of this sandal for hiking delighted several users
cons: A very few discovered that the cross strap was too short for them

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals with awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: my running shoes is size 9. this size 9 sandal fit my flat foot perfectly. Its quality is great. It can support my flat foot (attached pictures) very well. I will wear it to the Zion national park next week for hiking on the narrow. other sports sandal is like $100+. i believe Teva will do the same job. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JC0214

customer_reviews.title: Fails to grip while hiking; straps difficult to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals to use during a week long rafting trip on the Colorado River through the Grand Canyon. This trip included frequent hikes off-river through side canyons. I found these sandals to be extremely slippery - even treacherous - while hiking, and that's true of all surfaces, even dry rock. My second issue is with the straps, which I found exceptionally difficult to adjust right from the beginning. I fought with the problem at home during break-in but found the straps impossible to adjust once in the canyon.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a size down
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be lots of conflicting accounts of the sizing of these. My personal experience is that they run way too big. I have worn size 11 in all sneaker/boot/sandal brands my whole adult life and I ordered these in 11 and they were waaayyy too big and the strap was pulled so tight it actually hit the ground. The 10's are a snug but appropriate fit (see pic) That aside I think these are the best looking outdoor sandal out there (more attractive than Keen, which are the ultimate in middle aged dorkdom). Its hard to assess long term quality/comfort but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Teva's are true size, equivalent to Nike.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for summer hiking and as water shoes. Honestly, I think they're fugly but so far they do the job and I know they're high quality. I bought some cheap $18 slip on waterahoes earlier this year and tore through them in 2 days. This wont happen with these but the velcro would probably get sand in it. I liked the pulled strap model more but they were too expensive in my size. Docking 1 star because the inside is rubbing ... maybe I need to wear it in.
customer_reviews.author: awwMan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the shoe and the service
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and wore it on one trip and the sole is separating from the base. Really disappointed at the construction and the inability to communicate with anyone about a return/replacement.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are simply great. I wore them for an extended period of time the first time that I used them and there was no breaking in necessary. No blisters or discomfort of any kind. I have a recurring problem with plantar fasciitis and these sandals were great for my heels. I'd give them more than 5 stars if that was possible. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am an all year round sandal wearer, and I love that the straps are plenty long enough for me to wear a thick pair of wool socks with them in the winter time and still not be too tight. They are very comfy, I would say that these are some of the best sandals you will find for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Velden N.

customer_reviews.title: simple design but not true to size
customer_reviews.text: chose this pair as first it was $45 dollars and second, the one strap design similar to chacos but the comfort of teva was well worth it. however, when i received the pair, it was tight. i had the strap fully loosened and it was difficult to put on. once on, there was pain on my left arch and the straps on my right pinky toe was rubbing. so, nice design, but not the comfy tevas i know. ended purchasing the teva hurricane xlt2 alp instead. paid almost double but, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: thatdude

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Southern days
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes fun of my Jesus sandals but I love them. They’re comfortable and easy to put on. I will say that if you walk a lot (say 12,000 steps) you will need to tighten the straps from time to time. But otherwise a solid construction, nice color and comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Saintfu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend because he has very narrow feet. The Olive color is awesome. Disclaimer: I don’t believe this style is best for people with wide feet. The design of the show is more suited for narrow feet. I have wide feet and could not get my foot in this shoe. I wear the traditional strap Teva Hurricane Sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly F

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, great buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sandals to get ready for a camping trip. I have had them for a month and so far I love them. They fit a little big but I think it is because I got one size larger than I should have. I am still super happy with my buy! I would definitely buy them again but maybe a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: scorpioncarr1

customer_reviews.title: Check size comments
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10. Received a size 10 and was to long. I returned and got a size 9. Perfect fit. High quality sandal and the cross strap helps keep foot secure when tight. Good soft foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been a Teva fan for years, but I had a pair of older cork sport sandals that were still hanging on. But they also started to pick up smells as the cork was absorbent so I tossed them. Found these at a great price, and they look great! You can tell the quality right away as compared to poorly made items with overly noticeable seams or "too light" feel that lets you know there's not much quality material in there. Looking forward to several years of use out of these!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Farris

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals. Kinda miss the velcro straps
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and stylish looking. Wide enough and fit well. Only down side is plastic buckle thing wish it was metal and I kinda miss the velcro. They are kinda a pain to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Cjkoelemeyer

customer_reviews.title: no more chacos
customer_reviews.text: After wearing Chacos for years, I was tired of the price, discomfort and short life span. So far I have only had these one season, so I cant speak for the longevity, but price and comfort are exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: JamesPeters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, easy to kick off
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal with a simple loop lever to control the tension of the strapping. I really like that I can slip into them without having to pull my foot up to adjust the straps. just bend over and give the strap a slight tug to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality, brown (in photo) is actually green
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these based on the price and brown color option apparent on the image, however the shoes I received were much more of a green color. They fit wonderfully and I really wanted to keep them but the green color didn’t go well with my clothes so I returned them. If they would have been the color of the picture I would have kept them. Quality seemed really good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bclaggett

customer_reviews.title: They’re OK, I imagine if you could inspect them in person you’d find the best pair
customer_reviews.text: For the 1st week of usage they felt great, however the left sandal had minimum padding length between the strap and my foot so now when I wear them the padding is gone where it shouldn’t be gone and the cord rubs into my foot and creates pain. I’m forced to wear them loosely because of this. It’s the only problem area on the pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robin O’Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good and dorky.
customer_reviews.text: They are Texas. Great product for when I am channeling my inner "I pretend I dont care what people think about what my footwear looks like" alter ego.
customer_reviews.author: ap1986

customer_reviews.title: Not good for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: My narrow feet couldn't work with these. I'm a size 11 in every other shoe I wear. But with these I pulled the straps to their furthest point which left the rear straps dragging on the ground. And even then my feet were swimming around in the sandals. Ended up ordering size 10 Hurricane 4's which fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Burrstone

customer_reviews.title: Great fit , I measured and compared to chart provided
customer_reviews.text: Measure and check chart to get perfect fit , worked for me and the fit is comfortably snug and leaves room for adjustments if needed while wearing with socks too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look well made, durable, stylish, but left blisters
customer_reviews.text: Left blisters on the insides of both feet near the rear strap on my first time using them. Not sure why, as they both seemed to fit well initially. The material/padding on the inside must have been too rough. Other than that, I was happy with them. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Short strap
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe but the strap is short so if you have a fat or like me a tall foot it won't fit. Plus you can't adjust the rear strap so fitment might be hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Good water shoe. Fit is different.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is narrow and I don’t have a lot of extra strap to work with. Hard to get on and they are a little narrow up top. My pinky toe feels a little squished.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Teva sandals. My first pair lasted 16 years. Anyhow I like these cross strap sandals. Rugged, well made and feels good on my feet. This is my first experience with this style of buckle and release. I like it. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: MCargle

customer_reviews.title: Funny story
customer_reviews.text: So I had an issue with the sizes, I originally got a size 12, what I am in shoe size. That was say to big like a size 14 on a 10 year old. I just got my new one to exchange today, much better fit but they are 11's, try to find the right size... as for this little hiccup amazon and the company were awesome and understanding. I recommend these sandals if you are like me and hate flip flops and dad sandals
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Need half sizes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 12 so I ordered a 12. The width was perfect but they were too long in front of the toes that I’d stumble over them so I returned them. I bought them for an upcoming canoe trip. They’re very well made but the size is off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband after his favorite pair of Tevas that he had for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband after his favorite pair of Tevas that he had for years and years finally wore out. He says they're comfortable and they are good for wearing outdoors. He used them while we were camping both for walking and wearing the water.
customer_reviews.author: LDwyer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Soft rubber with arch support makes walking a pleasure. Easy to use straps makes taking it off and on a breeze. Great value and utility. Looking forward to using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Runs lage
customer_reviews.text: So, the website said this fit like a Nike shoe, but it is a full size larger. The size 7 fit like an 8 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMK

customer_reviews.title: Simple but good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this model. Did notice a little rub at the crossover of the toes but not enough to cause an issue. Fit is a bit large on the 11 (I'm a 10 1/2 or 43.5+) and found my toes having had about 1/2" to 3/4 " of extra space. No issues with arch placement, though. Buy and have a nice simple, good looking sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, secure fit.
customer_reviews.text: The heel strap is not adjustable. It turns out this makes fit easy, and the strap is comfortable. I have a somewhat high arch, and wear the sandal at the end of the adjustment strap.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday sandals. Love the flexibility to wear loose or tight and they are super comfortable. They offer both the relaxed fit of a flip flop as well as the security of a full strap sandal when you need/want it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carmosino

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal.
customer_reviews.text: About 10 hours of wear and they are great. No complaints at this time. Much more comfortable to my feet vs. Chaco sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I went took them hiking through the mountains. I didn’t have high expectations. However, they exceeded what I thought. They were comparable and held up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feet don't slip around when wet
customer_reviews.text: Feet don't slip around when wet. Awkward to put on as there is no buckle or velcro straps. If there was a quick snap buckle that would be great. Make it happen Teva. We've been paying your prices.
customer_reviews.author: Teri C.

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: The top strap is a pain in butt never again
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: prime wardrobe is a great idea - i may never go shopping again
customer_reviews.author: nbecohen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and made well with expectation of durability
customer_reviews.text: Nice look - straps took a while to adjust compared to previous Teva's
customer_reviews.author: Beverly K. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought these and said the straps drag the ground. Also the shoe is too big!
customer_reviews.author: KelCan

customer_reviews.title: Much loved
customer_reviews.text: My husband always complains about shoes not fitting his flat feet. He loves these. Even wears them when sandals are not appropriate. Maybe I should rate this lower?
customer_reviews.author: kat61687

customer_reviews.title: ... fit too big when size 10 usually fits me perfect. The materials were uncomfortable on the side of ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit too big when size 10 usually fits me perfect. The materials were uncomfortable on the side of my feet too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This are awesome right out of the box so glad I got the but remember there a size bigger than they say
customer_reviews.author: Tattoomike75

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. Comfortable and they are easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: The footbed was too long and not enough arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and terrific for hot days when you want to wear something light but flip-flops are too casual. Very happy with the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I have problems with lifting my toes. These are the first Sandler’s I’ve tried that don’t cause problems with my toes and actually stay put, chacos tend to sort of twist under my foot being very uncomfortable. Would highly recommend these over anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Men's teva sandles
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a leather pair of these Tevas for the past 10 years and this pair fits and wares as well so far
customer_reviews.author: Robert c. Kocak

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke.
customer_reviews.text: I lightly used these sandals, I haven’t even gotten a chance to hike with them and the strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Good pricing, Great color, blue, very comfortable, no need for break-in. The only issue is that they are hard to tighten up.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: one sandal has a longer back-trap than other, with cannot be adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: The irregularity makes shoes fit differently on each foot, one of the back-traps is a quarter inch longer, too bad, nice looking shoes, but can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice change from the usual Teva
customer_reviews.text: My husband is picky and likes the same old thing. These are an upgrade, more interesting, and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my husband and he loves the comfort of them. Perfect ones for long walks!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wore these during many hikes this past summer, and my feet never hurt once. Great for water hikes as well
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Glica

customer_reviews.title: too narrow, not everyone has narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: footbed felt comfortable standing on it. However, the straps are too short and and could not close the buckle. Not everyone has narrow feet. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: texgal

customer_reviews.title: Great water sandals
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sandal that would go in the lake and dry out quickly. I didn’t want something that went between my toes. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: alex a

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for a kayak trip and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for a kayak trip and they were prefect for both in the water and hiking steep terrain down the river banks.
customer_reviews.author: mrk

customer_reviews.title: Not a good hiking sandle
customer_reviews.text: They fell apart completely within 3 months. The straps pulled out of the soles.
customer_reviews.author: Mikea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things they are so comfortable. I did have to send them back and get a smaller size they run big. Even that was very easy and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sandal
customer_reviews.text: My son is serving a mission on a island and he needed sandals he LOVES these ... he said it has great support and his feet can finally breathe
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and seems durable. The color of the straps is more green than the brown shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fits as expected. I have had several pairs of sandals similar, but these are by far the most comfortable I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Rockemsockem

customer_reviews.title: Like a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of this sandal. Much lighter and way more comfortable than Chaco.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan8284

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but they make me sweat.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, they make the sole of my feet sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Boney Peña

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit and quite comfortable. I love this purchase and hopefully wears in well. We’ll see after a few weeks of wearing
customer_reviews.author: Hamid Hafidh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable foot sole and strapping. Will be my go to for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Colt Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great flips at a great price. Grand Canyon used and fit like a rugged hiking shoe. Amazing...
customer_reviews.author: megan badger

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the beach and to use as water shoes in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: I like the one strap design of these. It makes it more kind of like regular shoelaces where you can adjust using one adjustment. The strap seems fairly heavy duty. I haven't done a whole lot of walking in them yet. Not sure about traction / durability as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!!! Wasted $80 of hard earned money
customer_reviews.text: horrible. rip off!!! straps became unglued on right side ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: All around great. Love that there is no velcro. Feel really nice
customer_reviews.author: mattd1774

customer_reviews.title: Either they have horrible shoes sizes or my order was mixed up
customer_reviews.text: It might just be a mistake of putting the wrong shoe in the wrong box, but I am a size US 12 shoe. That should be around 11.25 inches long. The shoe I got was for a foot 12.5 inches long. That is a freaking size US 16 shoe. Either they have horrible shoes sizes or my order was mixed up. Either way I had to return it. Shoe looked nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: TEVA qua
customer_reviews.text: Great TEVA quality but with bit Moe effort to put on
customer_reviews.author: Ohsaycanuz

product_meta.title: Teva Men's M Hurricane Xlt2 Cross Strap Sport Sandal
product_meta.description: Inspired by our roots on the river, this throwback cross-strap sandal provides the easy comfort and stay-put support you need for all your epic missions and everyday wanderings.
feature_bullets: Water-ready polyester webbing stands up to the elements and dries quickly after getting wet
-EVA foam footbed cushions and softly supports for all-day comfort
